synopsis.text: DVD/Blu-ray bonus feature, "Saezuru Doubutsu wa Yarushikanai!" is a charming, parody mini-anime that reimagines the characters of "Twittering Birds Never Fly" as adorable pets. The series, which includes 25 previously released Twitter episodes and 5 brand-new ones, sees Doumeki transformed into a lovable dog and Yashiro as an endearing kitten. This delightful spin-off serves as a whimsical promotion for the film "Saezuru Tori wa Habatakanai: The Clouds Gather".
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
